start.text: You wake up in a mysterious forest. The sun is setting and you need to find shelter. To your left, you see a dark cave. To your right, a narrow path leads deeper into the woods.

cave.text: The cave is dark and damp. As your eyes adjust, you see two tunnels branching off. One has a faint glowing light, the other smells of fresh air.

choices.text: Take the tunnel with fresh air

path.text: The path leads to an ancient stone bridge over a rushing river. The bridge looks unstable. You hear strange noises from the forest behind you.

choices.text: Go back and find another way

treasure.text: You discover a hidden chamber filled with glittering treasure! A friendly dragon appears and offers to grant you one wish for being so brave.

exit.text: The tunnel leads you safely out of the cave system. You find yourself at the edge of a peaceful village where you're welcomed as a hero!

bridge.text: As you carefully cross the bridge, it suddenly collapses! You manage to grab onto a vine and swing to safety on the other side, where you discover a hidden waterfall.

waterfall.text: Behind the waterfall is a secret garden with magical plants that heal all your wounds. You decide to live here peacefully, learning the secrets of the forest.

river.text: Following the river, you're found by forest rangers who help you return to civilization. Your adventure becomes a legendary story told for generations.

wealth_ending.text: The dragon grants your wish! You become the richest person in the kingdom, using your wealth to help others and build a better world.

home_ending.text: In a flash of light, you're transported safely back home with amazing stories to tell. You live a happy life, always remembering your magical adventure.
